title: WITNESS TO DISASTER
text: Eyewitness; compelling stories of disaster, told through the eyes of those who were there.

title: TRAPPED
text: When sixteen men are trapped in the Andes for more than 10 weeks watching friends and family die around them with no sign of rescue.

title: BUILT FOR DESTRUCTION
text: We put some of the most dangerous volcanoes in the world under the spotlight and find out how they're able to wipe out cities.

title: SECONDS FROM DISASTER
text: In early 1954, one of the worldâ€™s first passenger jet airliners, the British-made de Havilland Comet.

title: REBUILDING PARADISE
text: On the morning of Nov. 8, 2018, a devastating firestorm engulfed the picturesque city of Paradise, California.

title: DESPERATE HOURS
text: A sudden calamitous event, causing great loss of life, damage, or hardship, like a flood, a tornado, an airplane crash, or an earthquake.
